_comment: 10-hour overnight sweep targeting velocity/heading jitter, unbounded points, and track smoothness.
_note: Assumes good bg/fg separation already. Focuses on Kalman filter, gating, and clustering params that affect track smoothness.
_rationale: process_noise_vel: primary driver of velocity jitter. Lower = smoother but slower to react.
process_noise_pos: affects position stability. Lower = less position drift.
measurement_noise: observation trust. Higher = more smoothing, lower = more responsive.
occlusion_cov_inflation: covariance growth during misses. Affects re-association jitter.
foreground_dbscan_eps: cluster cohesion. Tighter = fewer unbounded points but risks fragmentation.

params.name: process_noise_vel
params.description: Velocity process noise. Current default 0.2. Lower = smoother velocity estimates.

params.name: process_noise_pos
params.description: Position process noise. Current default 0.05. Lower = less positional jitter.

params.name: measurement_noise
params.description: Observation uncertainty. Current default 0.05. Higher = more smoothing.

params.name: occlusion_cov_inflation
params.description: Covariance inflation during occlusion. Current default 0.5. Lower = less jitter on reacquisition.

params.name: foreground_dbscan_eps
params.description: Clustering radius. Current default 0.8. Affects unbounded point ratio.
